author: Kai Gonzalez
body:
Welcome to the latest news, we at NFy have added newer features, and more modernized bug fixes, and quality of life features.

Such as, new covers, bug fixes, and more.

Also, enjoy finding out the new easter egg, you'll like it ;)

This is also the first news article! These are licensed under MIT, and stay tuned for more news, to stay up to date with the latest news.
title: New NFy Features for the end of the week
